StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SignCounselingRecord]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CounselingID uniqueidentifier, @RecruiterSignatureId uniqueidentifier = null, @SncoicSignatureId uniqueidentifier, @UpdateUserId uniqueidentifier
AS BEGIN
UPDATE [RSSOSS].[USMC].[Counseling] SET RecruiterSignatureID = @RecruiterSignatureId, NCOICSignatureID = @SncoicSignatureId, LastUpdatedDate = GETDATE(), LastUpdatedBy = @UpdateUserId WHERE ID = @CounselingID
END
